item.description: Continuing to build up to the official release, the social media for the upcoming Mobile Suit Gundam Seed FREEDOM film recently released a new trailer. The trailer was accompanied by 10 new visuals showcasing 19 characters and four mobile suits set to appear in the animated feature film.Serving as the film's fourth promotional video, the trailer previews the theme song "Freedom" by Takanori Nishikawa (T.M. Revolution) with producer t.komuro (Tetsuya Komuro). It is interesting to note that the film will also see See-Saw return to the franchise for the ending song "Sarigiwa no Romantics" (Romantics Upon Parting).Mobile Suit Gundam Seed FREEDOMÂ will be set chronologically in C.E. (Cosmic Era) 75, following the events of the secondÂ Gundam SeedÂ television anime,Â Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny. The film was first announced in 2021 as part of theÂ Mobile Suit Gundam SeedÂ Project Ignited initiative, which commemorated the 20th anniversary of the originalÂ Mobile Suit Gundam SeedÂ anime in 2022.Mobile Suit Gundam Seed FREEDOMÂ is set to release in Japan January 26, 2024.ğŸ¥ ï½›C.E.75 #ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ SEED ã®æ–°ãŸãªç‰©èªã€ğŸğŸğŸğŸ’.ğŸ.ğŸğŸ” ğ‘ğğ€ğƒ ğ’ğ‡ğğ–ğŸ¬ã€‘ã€æ©Ÿå‹•æˆ¦å£«ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ SEED FREEDOMã€â”é‚ã«ç‰©èªã®æ ¸å¿ƒã«è¿«ã‚‹â”“âœ¨æœ¬äºˆå‘Šå…¬é–‹âœ¨â”—â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”›ãƒ ãƒ“ãƒã‚±ã®ã”è³¼å…¥ç­‰ã€æœ€æ–°æƒ…å ±ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ğŸ‘‡https://t.co/1z3H8CihaA#SEEDFREEDOM #g_seed pic.twitter.com/eYYvoq5OFpâ€” æ©Ÿå‹•æˆ¦å£«ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ SEEDã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚º (@SEED_HDRP) December 12, 2023Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast
